item.title: trivy-operator 2.5: Patch release for Admisssion controller
item.description: Today I am happy to announce the release of trivy-operator 2.5. This blog post focuses on the functionality provided by the trivy-operator 2.5 release.

item.title: Ubuntu 22.04 - Microsoft Active Directory Group Policy
item.description: In this Post I will show you the new Active Directory Group Policy integration in Ubuntu 22.04.

item.title: trivy-operator 1.0
item.description: Today I am happy to announce the release of trivy-operator 1.0 and assign the first ever stable release number. This blog post focuses on the functionality provided by the trivy-operator 1.0 release.
